languages.text: "Что? Нет!" {n}Арджента качает головой и устало трет виски.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Вольный Торговец. Я... тяжело себя чувствую на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}. Это небольшая, личная слабость, и она не повлияет на мою стойкость и боевые навыки!"

traits.locale_text: "Что? Нет!" {n}Арджента качает головой и устало трет виски.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Вольный Торговец. Я... тяжело себя чувствую на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}. Это небольшая, личная слабость, и она не повлияет на мою стойкость и боевые навыки!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."
languages.original_text: "Что? Нет!" {n}Арджента качает головой и устало трет виски.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Вольный Торговец. Я... тяжело себя чувствую на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}. Это небольшая, личная слабость, и она не повлияет на мою стойкость и боевые навыки!"

traits.locale_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. I'm... not good with Footfall. It's a minor, personal weakness, and it won't affect my mettle and skill in combat!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “什么？没有！”{n}阿洁塔摇了摇头，疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“抱歉，行商浪人。对我来说，{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个地方……有些痛苦。这是我个人方面的小小弱点，不过我依然和往常一样，做好了战斗准备！这不会对我的战斗有任何影响。”
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: “什么？没有！”{n}阿洁塔摇了摇头，疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“抱歉，行商浪人。对我来说，{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个地方……有些痛苦。这是我个人方面的小小弱点，不过我依然和往常一样，做好了战斗准备！这不会对我的战斗有任何影响。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cómo? ¡No!». {n}Argenta niega con la cabeza y se frota las sienes, cansada.{/n} «Lo lamento, Comerciante Independiente. Estar aquí, en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, me... resulta difícil. Es una debilidad personal sin importancia, ¡estoy tan lista para luchar como siempre! No afectará a mis habilidades en combate».
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo? ¡No!». {n}Argenta niega con la cabeza y se frota las sienes, cansada.{/n} «Lo lamento, Comerciante Independiente. Estar aquí, en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, me... resulta difícil. Es una debilidad personal sin importancia, ¡estoy tan lista para luchar como siempre! No afectará a mis habilidades en combate».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「何だと？ダメだ！」{n}アルジェンタは頭を振り、疲れたようにこめかみをさすった。{/n}「すまないが、自由開拓者。ここ、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}にいるのは…我にとっては難しいことなのです。個人的かつ些細な弱点ではありますが、これまで通り戦う準備はできています！我の戦闘技術に影響はない」
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: 「何だと？ダメだ！」{n}アルジェンタは頭を振り、疲れたようにこめかみをさすった。{/n}「すまないが、自由開拓者。ここ、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}にいるのは…我にとっては難しいことなのです。個人的かつ些細な弱点ではありますが、これまで通り戦う準備はできています！我の戦闘技術に影響はない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Was? Nein!" {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf und reibt sich müde die Schläfen.{/n} "Verzeiht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber hier auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zu sein ... ist schwierig für mich. Es ist nur eine kleine persönliche Schwäche, aber ich bin kampfbereit wie immer! Meine diesbezüglichen Fähigkeiten sind nicht davon betroffen."
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: "Was? Nein!" {n}Argenta schüttelt den Kopf und reibt sich müde die Schläfen.{/n} "Verzeiht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Aber hier auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zu sein ... ist schwierig für mich. Es ist nur eine kleine persönliche Schwäche, aber ich bin kampfbereit wie immer! Meine diesbezüglichen Fähigkeiten sind nicht davon betroffen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Quoi ? Non ! » {n}Argenta secoue la tête et se frotte les tempes avec lassitude.{/n} « Mes excuses, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Revenir à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} est... difficile pour moi. Mais ce n'est qu'une faiblesse insignifiante qui ne m'empêchera certainement pas de me battre ! Je vous assure que mes aptitudes au combat ne s'en ressentiront pas. »
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? Non ! » {n}Argenta secoue la tête et se frotte les tempes avec lassitude.{/n} « Mes excuses, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Revenir à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} est... difficile pour moi. Mais ce n'est qu'une faiblesse insignifiante qui ne m'empêchera certainement pas de me battre ! Je vous assure que mes aptitudes au combat ne s'en ressentiront pas. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne? Hayır." {n}Argenta, kafasını sallayıp bitkinlikle şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakma Hür Tacir. Burada... {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} bulunmak... Nasıl desem? Beni zorluyor. Ancak merak etme, benimkisi ufak bir kişisel zaaf sadece. Çatışmaya her daima hazırım! Savaş becerilerime ket vurmaz."
languages.original_text: "What? No!" {n}Argenta shakes her head and rubs her temples tiredly.{/n} "Apologies, Rogue Trader. Being here, on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}, is... difficult for me. It's a minor, personal weakness, but I'm as ready to fight as ever! It will have no effect on my combat skills."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Hayır." {n}Argenta kafasını salladıktan sonra şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Kusuruma bakma Hür Tacir. Burada… {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'da bulunmak… Nasıl desem? Beni zorluyor. Önemsiz kişisel bir zaaf ancak merak etme, her daim savaşa hazırım! Çatışma yeteneklerimi zerre etkilemeyeceğinden emin olabilirsin."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
